titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CARE PROFESSIONAL LOCAL IDENTIFIER (DELIVERING BABY) - Description

body.p: CARE PROFESSIONAL LOCAL IDENTIFIER (DELIVERING BABY) is the same as attribute CARE PROFESSIONAL IDENTIFIER .
CARE PROFESSIONAL LOCAL IDENTIFIER (DELIVERING BABY) is a unique local CARE PROFESSIONAL IDENTIFIER within a Health Care Provider and may be assigned automatically by the computer system.
CARE PROFESSIONAL LOCAL IDENTIFIER (DELIVERING BABY) is the CARE PROFESSIONAL IDENTIFIER of the CARE PROFESSIONAL who delivered the baby.
